title: About me
text:
Hi, I’m Ishita Khanna, a data analyst with a focus on creating clear, insightful and impactful data-driven solutions.
I approach data projects with a blend of analytical thinking, attention to detail, and a user focused mindset, Whether it’s exploring open datasets, designing dashboards, or building end-to-end workflows, I enjoy finding meaningful patterns and communicating results effectively.
This portfolio highlights some of my recent work from the TidyTuesday community and will continue to grow with academic, personal, and applied projects.
I’m always open to learning new techniques, tools and domains and excited to contribute wherever data can make a difference.

title: Data Analytics Portfolio
text:
I’m a data analyst with a strong experience in data visualisation, predictive modelling, and interactive dashboards using raw data to drive meaningful decisions across multiple domains.
My toolbox includes:

Languages & Analytics: R, Python, SQL, Excel
Visualisation: ggplot2, Tableau, Power BI, R Shiny, d3.js
Machine Learning: Supervised/Unsupervised learning, predictive modeling
Cloud & Web: Posit Cloud, RStudio Connect, Quarto, HTML/CSS
Project Tools: GitHub, Trello, Notion




This portfolio currently showcases a growing collection of my Tidy Tuesday projects, where I display my exploratory analysis, data visualisation and dashboarding experience using real world datasets.
I’ll continue to expand it over time with additional projects, including academic work and case studies from various domains.
Explore Projects →
Thanks for stopping by!
